room_title: Escape room "The Istanbul Gambit" by Enigma Adventures in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: Best escape room I have experienced. Took my 15-year-old for his birthday and he loved it. Can’t wait for the next one to open!

room_title: Escape room "The Istanbul Gambit" by Enigma Adventures in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: Plenty of puzzles to solve with various degrees of difficulty. A large group could all be engaged in solving problems concurrently. Can’t wait for next room to open.

room_title: Escape room "The Istanbul Gambit" by Enigma Adventures in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: Highly recommended!!! Such a fun experience! A very interactive room with amazing detail! A great challenge with many different puzzle pieces all playing into the overall puzzle! Can’t wait for the next puzzle room to open!

room_title: Escape room "The Istanbul Gambit" by Enigma Adventures in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: Great story to the room, awesome details within room. Very fun. Would highly recommend to all levels.

room_title: Escape room "The Istanbul Gambit" by Enigma Adventures in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: We loved "The Istanbul Gambit" room! Very well put together and loved all the detail that was put into it. A very immersive experience with challenging but solvable puzzles. Can't wait to try out their next room!
